long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mute the misery of England’s bitter defeat in the Euro 2024 final against Spain with England Blocker, compliments of Paddy Power.

To erase evidence of England's downfall, Paddy Power's England Blocker is here to save the day.

So, it’s definitely NOT coming home. But if you'd rather shut the door on arguments over whether Southgate's should stay or go and erase all evidence of England's defeat, download Paddy Power's England Blocker today. Developed by Paddy Power, this ingenious Chrome extension promises to rescue you from the never-ending deluge. With just a few taps, the England Blocker becomes your personal guardian, meticulously eradicating all evidence of what occurred in Germany from your digital world. Banish the bombardment of what ifs and restore balance to your footballing universe.

Brace yourself for sweet relief with our shield from the tsunami of news coverage about ANOTHER one that got away. Silence mention of Southgate and his squad by removing mention of them entirely from your social feed. Download the free England Blocker today, courtesy of Paddy Power today. You're welcome.
